# Post-Mortem Suggestions

This directory contains improvement suggestions generated by the Post-Mortem Agent after analyzing completed multi-agent pipeline executions.

## Naming Convention
`post-mortem-suggestions-<topic>-<YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS>.md`

## Purpose
Post-mortem documents capture lessons learned from pipeline executions and propose concrete improvements to the agent ecosystem.

## Contents
- Executive summary with pipeline health scores
- Stage-by-stage analysis (Research â†’ Validation)
- Cross-cutting analysis (information flow, efficiency)
- Pattern extraction (positive and negative)
- Prioritized action items
- Specific file change recommendations with diffs

## Outputs Updated By Post-Mortem

| Target | Type of Update |
|--------|----------------|
| `.github/agents/*.agent.md` | Agent behavior improvements |
| `.github/instructions/*.instructions.md` | Instruction clarifications |
| `.github/*/README.md` | Directory context updates |
| `docs/*.md` | Project documentation |
| `README.md` | Top-level documentation |

## Usage

1. Post-Mortem Agent runs after pipeline completion
2. Analyzes all 8 pipeline documents (4 original + 4 reviewed)
3. Generates suggestions document in this directory
4. Human or Problem Solver reviews recommendations
5. High-priority items implemented immediately
6. Lower-priority items added to backlog

## Retention

- Keep all post-mortem documents for trend analysis
- Review aggregate metrics quarterly
- Archive documents older than 6 months

## Related Agents

- **Problem Solver Agent**: Orchestrates the pipeline, triggers post-mortem
- **Output Review Agent**: Produces reviewed documents analyzed by post-mortem
- **All Specialized Agents**: Receive improvement recommendations
